entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
